revised_title: Infra-Red Spectra of Polymers and Related Monomers: A Study of Molecular Structure
tldr: The authors studied the infra-red spectra of polymers and related monomers, focusing on the vibration frequencies and molecular structures. They analyzed the spectra of vinyl halides, chloroprene, and chlorinated paraffins, providing valuable information about normal vibration frequencies. The study helps in understanding the correlation between vibrational spectra and molecular structure, contributing to the field of polymer chemistry.
